screen module¶

class screen.Screen(**kwargs)¶

initializing a curses pad

Parameters

init_window(nlines, ncols, begin_y, begin_x, name)¶

initializing a curses window

Parameters

  • nlines (int) – number of lines for the window

  • ncols (int) – number of columns for the window

  • begin_y (int) – y-coordinate for the top left corner of the window

  • begin_x (int) – x-coordinate for the top left corner of the window

  • name (str) – name of the window object

Return type

None

Returns

nothing
